ELEMENT.TITLE: Inline Zoom, JSON Options et all... (experimental)
ELEMENT.SUMMARY:
This layout is wide - may not work with every theme
Features dynamic imaging on both the product images and for enlargement on the accessory images. In addition to related items and accessories, there is a third product list which will automatically load images from other categories the product is in (cached daily).
This layout supports tagging for the product in focus as well as the product lists (accessories, related items, etc).

ELEMENT.HTML: <% /* If the item is tagged, go through the list of tags and display one tag */ loadurp("product:is:discontinued"); default(""); goto(label=>"SKIP_DISCONTINUED",ne=>"1"); load("stock/tags/earthy_peel/discontinued"); image(library=>"proshop",h=>"51",w=>"55",bg=>"TTTTTT",tag=>"1",alt=>"Discontinued"); print(); stop(); :SKIP_DISCONTINUED(); loadurp("product:is:preorder"); default(""); goto(label=>"SKIP_PREORDER",ne=>"1"); load("stock/tags/earthy_peel/preorder"); image(library=>"proshop",h=>"51",w=>"55",bg=>"TTTTTT",tag=>"1",alt=>"Preorder"); print(); stop(); :SKIP_DISCONTINUED(); loadurp("product:is:sale"); default(""); goto(label=>"SKIP_SALE",ne=>"1"); load("stock/tags/earthy_peel/sale"); image(library=>"proshop",h=>"51",w=>"55",bg=>"TTTTTT",tag=>"1",alt=>"Sale"); print(); stop(); :SKIP_SALE(); loadurp("product:is:specialorder"); default(""); goto(label=>"SKIP_SPECIALORDER",ne=>"1"); load("stock/tags/earthy_peel/specialorder"); image(library=>"proshop",h=>"51",w=>"55",bg=>"TTTTTT",tag=>"1",alt=>"Special Order"); print(); stop(); :SKIP_SPECIALORDER(); loadurp("product:is:newarrival"); default(""); goto(label=>"SKIP_NEW",ne=>"1"); load("stock/tags/earthy_peel/newarrival"); image(library=>"proshop",h=>"51",w=>"55",bg=>"TTTTTT",tag=>"1",alt=>"New Arrival"); print(); stop(); :SKIP_NEW(); loadurp("product:is:bestseller"); default(""); goto(label=>"SKIP_BESTSELLER",ne=>"1"); load("stock/tags/earthy_peel/bestseller"); image(library=>"proshop",h=>"51",w=>"55",bg=>"TTTTTT",tag=>"1",alt=>"Best Seller"); print(); stop(); :SKIP_BESTSELLER(); print(""); %>

<% /* This message usually has stuff like inventory disposition, or claim details. */ load($message); goto(eq=>"",label=>"END"); print("
"); print($message); print("
"); :END(); print(""); %>
<% /* element used only for generating the add to cart button. options are generated with javascript/json. */ load($PURCHASABLE); goto(eq=>"0",label=>"END"); print(""); print(" "); :END(); print(""); %>
"); /* if quantity is displayed, then always override in cart. */ print(""); load($ID); format(posttext=>":add_to_cart"); set($ATCID=>$_); element(TYPE=>"SITEBUTTON",button=>"add_to_cart",SKU=>$SKU,PID=>$PID,ID=>$ATCID,alt=>"Add to Cart",name=>"add_to_cart"); print(); print("

<%
print("<!-- tags, if item is tagged -->");
loadurp("product:is:shipfree"); default("");
goto(label=>"SKIP_SHIPFREE",ne=>"1");
	load("stock/tags/earthy_peel/shipfree");
	image(library=>"proshop",h=>"20",w=>"110",bg=>"TTTTTT",tag=>"1",alt=>"This item ships free");
	print();
:SKIP_SHIPFREE();
%>

<% print(""); /* display image1 big. Check to see if image 2 is set. if so, start looping through product images till a image field is hit and empty. */ /* the height and width of the big image. It is a variable because it is output several times and this makes it easier to change. */ set($imagewidth=>"300"); set($imageheight=>"300"); loadurp("product:zoovy:prod_name"); format(encode=>"entity"); set($PROD_NAME=>$_); /* IE and FireFox cant seem to decide whether a border is within the width or outside. This compensates for that by creating a div around the image with a fixed width and putting the bordered div inside that. */ loadurp("product:zoovy:prod_image1"); set($IMAGE1=>$_); stop(unless=>$_); print("
%PROD_TAG%"); print(""); print("
mouse over or click image(s) to enlarge
"); /* if image2 is not set, we do not show any thumbnails */ loadurp("product:zoovy:prod_image2"); stop(unless=>$_); set($i=>"1"); /* this is the product field that we append $i to for generating the image key. */ set($image_key=>"product:zoovy:prod_image"); :LOOP(); load($image_key); format(posttext=>$i); loadurp($_); /* we use the filename in multiple places, so I set the var instead of loadurp'ing it several times. */ set($image=>$_); /* if the current load has no value, then there are no more images to process. Stop. Otherwise, print a thumbnail with JS to change big image and open original onclick */ stop(unless=>$_); print("
"); load($image); image(src=>$image,w=>"150",h=>"45",bg=>"ffffff",m=>"1",tag=>"1",alt=>$PROD_NAME); print(); print("
"); load($i); math(op=>"add",var=>"1"); set($i=>$_); /* Go to loop and do it all again. */ goto(label=>"LOOP",ne=>""); %>
<% print(""); loadurp("product:youtube:videoid"); stop(unless=>$_); print("Watch Video | "); %>

<% print(""); loadurp("product:zoovy:prod_mfg"); default(""); set($mfg=>$_); /* if mfg is not set, we dont print it, so we skip down to blank. If it does have a value, it is printed and linked to search results. */ goto(label=>"BLANK",eq=>""); print(""); print("
Manufacturer: "); print($mfg); print("
"); :BLANK(); print(""); %>

<% print(""); loadurp("product:zoovy:base_price"); stop(unless=>$_); set($price=>$_); load($price); format(money); format(pretext=>"
Our price: ",posttext=>"
"); print(); /* if the msrp is blank or the msrp < price, do not display savings */ loadurp("product:zoovy:prod_msrp"); stop(unless=>$_); set($msrp=>$_); math(op=>"subtract",var=>$price); goto(label=>"END",lt=>".99"); set($savings=>$_); /* we only get here if msrp > price. display msrp and savings */ load($msrp); format(money); format(pretext=>"Retail: ",posttext=>" save "); print(); load($savings); format(money); print(); print(" ( "); load($price); math(op=>"divide",var=>$msrp); math(op=>"subtract",var=>"1"); math(op=>"multiply",var=>"-100"); format(hidezero); format(convert=>"number",precision=>"0"); print(); print("% ) "); :END(); %>

ELEMENT.PRETEXT: Volume discounts

ELEMENT.HTML:
<% load($TOTAL_REVIEWS); default(""); goto(ne=>"0",label=>"MULTIPLE"); print("
Be the first to review this product
"); stop(); :MULTIPLE(); print("
"); load($AVG_RATING); format(pretext=>"stock/reviews/shiny/"); image(library=>"proshop",h=>"35",w=>"130",bg=>"ffffff",tag=>"1"); print(); print("
Reviewed "); print($TOTAL_REVIEWS); print(" times
"); %>

<% print(""); loadurp("profile:wishpot:merchantid"); default(""); stop(unless=>$_); set($WISHPOT_MID=>$_); print("
"entity"); print(); print("" type='hidden'>
"); %>

ELEMENT.DEFAULT:
<link rel="stylesheet" type="text/css" href="%GRAPHICS_URL%/jslib/magiczoomplus-2.0.8/magiczoomplus.css">
<script typ='text/javascript' src='%GRAPHICS_URL%/jslib/magiczoomplus-2.0.8/magiczoomplus.js'></script>

<script type='text/javascript' src='%GRAPHICS_URL%/jslib/scriptaculous-js-1.8.2/lib/prototype.js'></script>
<script type='text/javascript' src='%GRAPHICS_URL%/jslib/dynamicoptions/DynamicOptionList-20090825.js'></script>
<script type='text/javascript' src='%GRAPHICS_URL%/jslib/pogs/json_interpreter-20091130g.js'></script>


<style type='text/css'>
/* default style for form div in json options. override in theme with #JSONPogDisplay .zform_div */
.zform_div	{margin-bottom:5px;}



/* styles for the reviews. override with #productReviews .reviewquote, etc... */

#reviews .reviewquote	{background:url(%LAYOUT_URL%/p-20100615_quote_rt-21x17.png) no-repeat bottom right; margin-right:25px;}
#reviews blockquote		{margin:7px 5px 10px 0;}
#reviews blockquote:first-letter {background: url(%LAYOUT_URL%/p-20100615_quote_left-21x17.png) no-repeat left top; padding-left: 25px; font: italic 18px Georgia, "Times New Roman", Times, serif; font-weight:bold;}

</style>


<script typ='text/javascript'>
<!--


MagicZoomPlus.options = {
  'background-color':'#000000',
  'background-opacity':'50',
  'opacity-reverse':'true',
  'selectors-mouseover-delay':'0'
 }

//'click-to-initialize':'true',
MagicThumb.options = {'buttons-display':'close'}



function openWindow(url,w,h) {
	adviceWin = window.open(url,'advice','status=no,width='+w+',height='+h+',menubar=no,scrollbars=yes');
	adviceWin.focus(true);
	}


//-->

</script>





<form name='addToCartFrm' id='addToCartFrm' action="%CART_URL%" method="get"  onSubmit="return validate_pogs();">

<script type='text/javascript'>
//options in a JSON format
var hasOptions = true;
<%
load($JAVASCRIPT);
/* if the value of $JAVASCRIPT is = v2, that means there are no options. hasOptions is set to false */
goto(label=>"END",eq=>"v2");
	print();
	stop();
:END();
print("hasOptions = false;");
%>
</script>

ELEMENT.DEFAULT:
<script type="text/javascript"> 

//used to generate image tags with the js function zoovyImageUrl (which is in a js file)
var image_base_url = "%IMAGE_URL%"; 

//used in conjunction with the loadscript function, which is in a js file.
var graphics_url = "%GRAPHICS_URL%";
 
if(hasOptions == true)	{

	var MyPOGs = Class.create(ZoovyPOGs, {
		xinit : function($super) {}
		});
	

	var pogs = new MyPOGs(MYADD2CART_pogs);
	pogs.xinit();
	
	
	var ids = pogs.listOptionIDs();
	for ( var i=0, len=ids.length; i<len; ++i) {
		var pog = pogs.getOptionByID(ids[i]);
		pogs.renderOption(pog)
		}
	}

</script>





</form>
